problem_names: lemma List_product_concat_map: "List.product xs ys = concat (map (\<lambda>x. map (\<lambda>y. (x,y)) ys) xs)"
lemma all_pairs_list_product: "all_pairs xs = List.product xs xs"
lemma all_pairs: "\<forall> (x,y) \<in> (set xs \<times> set xs). (x,y) \<in> set (all_pairs xs)"
lemma all_pairs_set: "set (all_pairs xs) = set xs \<times> set xs"
translations: lemma List_product_concat_map: "List.product xs ys = concat (map (\<lambda>x. map (\<lambda>y. (x,y)) ys) xs)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. List.product xs ys = concat (map (\<lambda>x. map (Pair x) ys) xs)

definition all_pairs :: "'a list \<Rightarrow> ('a \<times> 'a) list" where
  "all_pairs xs \<equiv> concat (map (\<lambda>x. map (\<lambda>y. (x,y)) xs) xs)"
lemma all_pairs_list_product: "all_pairs xs = List.product xs xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. all_pairs xs = List.product xs xs
lemma all_pairs: "\<forall> (x,y) \<in> (set xs \<times> set xs). (x,y) \<in> set (all_pairs xs)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>(x, y)\<in>set xs \<times> set xs.
       (x, y) \<in> set (all_pairs xs)
lemma all_pairs_set: "set (all_pairs xs) = set xs \<times> set xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (all_pairs xs) = set xs \<times> set xs
